messages.message:
Full Stack Developer in Scottsdale with a Vibrant Startup

Hi Brian, 

I came across your profile and I was immediately impressed by your breadth of experience. I'm working with a startup in Scottsdale called Mid-America Careers, and they are looking for a full-stack developer with expertise in Python and Elastic Search to re-engineer their infrastructure. This is a big project with huge impact, and gives you the opportunity to make a direct impact on a growing business. If you're successful, the potential upside is huge. 

I see that you're open to new opportunities, and I'd like to speak with you about this role. Are you available for a short call today or tomorrow? 

Thank you and I look forward to connecting with you!

Alec Meyer | Senior Recruiter | SelectOne
2813 Wehrle Dr. Suite 3 | Williamsville, NY 14221
d+ 716 906 5371 | e+ ameyer@selectoneLLC.com | w+ www.selectoneLLC.com

Alec Meyer | Senior Recruiter | SelectOne
d+ 716 906 5371 | e+ ameyer@selectoneLLC.com

Hi Brian,

Thanks for getting back to me so quickly! Are you available this afternoon for a short call?

Alec Meyer | Senior Recruiter | SelectOne
